about_the_game:
Will Never Repent Buying This ! Currently, no customer players have archive the game winning.

A Beautiful Story


This is a local-colored and serious-limitted fiction world. You play a employee for a small country coastline, and live in a countryside initially.

For a hint from a kangaroo, you leave your small country, going to a big country, finding the one you miss. But first time, You don't success.

And you back your homeland. For some reason, you go again, and found the one you miss.

In this game, everything needs your own exploration. You can't use those popular simplified ideas! You need to think about where you can go, to touch and serve the characters in the story, to research mazes, enemies and principles, and finally find the important person back!

Your task is not a ranking list, but thinking, finding and to defeat finite enemies.

🏰 Experimental Turn-based Combat


Your role lives a passive and confused days, but this work develops the original turn-based combat.

  • A conciseness-typed combat. Your enemy has only four types of attacks(ordinary attack, brave attack, outstanding attack, powerful attack).
  • Encounter enemies in a layout designed wilderness. Troops in the wild will limit your path of action, and you may not be able to kill them all.
  • Strategy On Level-up. Passing through the maze requires strategy, and a single battle requires coordination with passing through the maze.
  • Mechanism puzzles are without any reminders. There are no reminders in the game about how to crack mechanisms.
  • With more language interest in skill names. The increase in level will enable you to acquire skills.

You can't be defeated by the enemy in battle, otherwise the game will end. You have to do a new game play.

🎮 You can continue to challenge at any time


Engage in dialogue, strategy and combat——

  • Move in the map, talk to the characters in the game, understand the situation and find the destination
  • Research mazes, enemies and principles, trigger appropriate switches to open the door
  • Complete the task requested by the character in the game

How to relieve worries, only victory!
